job.title: Cloud DevOps Engineer
job.description: <p>The<strong> Cloud DevOps&nbsp;Engineer</strong>&nbsp;will be working with the engineering team and focusing on AWS/Azure/GCP/OCI infrastructure and automation.&nbsp;A key part of the role is championing and leading infrastructure as code. The other major role is developing and maintaining the Python scripts to support the automation jobs.&nbsp;The Engineer will work closely with Dev/QA team to support our SaaS product base upon the public cloud platform.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Duties &amp; Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Design cloud infrastructure that is secure, scalable, and highly available on AWS</li><li>Work collaboratively with software engineering to define infrastructure and deployment requirements</li><li>Provision, configure and maintain AWS/Azure/GCP/OCI cloud infrastructure defined as code</li><li>Ensure configuration and compliance with configuration management tools</li><li>Administer and troubleshoot Linux based systems</li><li>Troubleshoot problems across a wide array of services and functional areas</li><li>Build and maintain operational tools for deployment, monitoring, and analysis of AWS/Azure/GCP/OCI infrastructure and systems</li><li>Develop and maintain the infrastructure-related Python tools.</li><li>Work with developers to develop business-level Python tools. </li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>At least 3-5 years of experience building and maintaining AWS infrastructure (VPC, EC2, Security Groups, IAM, ECS, CodeDeploy, CloudFront, S3)</li><li>Strong understanding of how to secure AWS environments and meet compliance requirements</li><li>Hands-on experience deploying and managing infrastructure with Terraform</li><li>Hands-on experience developing with Python.</li><li>Solid foundation of networking and Linux administration</li><li>Experience with Docker, GitHub, Jenkins, ELK and&nbsp;deploying applications on AWS</li><li>Ability to learn/use a wide variety of open source technologies and tools</li><li>Strong bias for action and ownership</li></ul><p></p>
